english.segment1: I need to look confident so I don't feel ashamed. I put a strong face on so they won't see my mistakes. I work to earn their praise as I go about my day. I need them to need me. So I feel I have a place
english.segment2: Here I am defenseless. Abba, Father I have nothing left. Only in my weakness will I find you. Find You. Only in my weakness
english.segment3: I don't want to wait on You. I'm afraid You'll never show. Lord, I know you love me. But I still feel so alone. I'll do anything to turn my thoughts off. To hush this silence. I don't want to be reminded of my loneliness
english.segment4: Here I am defenseless. Abba, Father I have nothing left. Only in my weakness will I find you. Find You. Only in my weakness
english.segment6: Here I am defenseless. Abba, Father I have nothing left. Only in my weakness will I find you. Find You. Only in my weakness
english.segment7: I'm laying down. I'm letting go. I'm laying down. I'm letting go
